task.title: Instance Detail - Volumes
task.shortdesc: This tab allows you to view and manage the volumes attached to the selected instance. Also, it allows you to attach volumes to your instance.

step.cmd: To attach a volume to your instance, click the Attach a volume icon to access the Attach volume page.
Refer to the Help on the Attach volume page for additional instructions.

task.title: Volumes context menu actions
task.shortdesc: Each tile in the volume list has a context menu. Clicking the action icon (a row of three dots) in the upper right corner of a volume tile brings up a menu of actions that you can perform on the selected volume.

taskbody.context:
The following context menu actions are available:
Detach volume. Select this option to detach the selected volume from the instance.
Monitor. Select this option to access the CloudWatch data associated with the metrics defined from the Monitoring tab of the Volumes Details page.
